column2: caption="Iorlas" by [[The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game]]

column1: Iorlas was an uncle of [[Bergil]], either [[Beregond]]'s brother or brother-in-law. When [[Peregrin Took
column2: Pippin]] mentioned to Bergil he was 29 years old, this surprised Bergil, as his uncle Iorlas was also 29, and nigh twice as tall as the Hobbit.<ref>{{RK

column1: ''Iorlas'' could either mean "Old Leaf" or "Old Joy" in [[Sindarin]].
'''2003: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]'':'''
:One of the Gondorians on the battlements of [[Minas Tirith]] was Iorlas. He is only identified as Iorlas on a [[Decipher Card]].
